column3: Should be included in v0.16 release notes
Concept ACK, this makes sense, there is no reason to ever call this on an unknown (neither directly owned nor watch-only) address.
Thanks @promag - both good suggestions.\n\nI've squashed this down to 2 commits and changed the error text to "Address not found in wallet". No other changes.
@jnewbery Needs rebase\n\nPing me back, so we can get this merged.
@MarcoFalke - apologies. I didn't realise there was a silent merge conflict. Rebased.
